Basics

Basic elements are the smallest and simple design pattern elements translated to interfaces.

Basic UI tags, such as form labels, inputs or buttons. They also include more abstract elements like color palettes, fonts, and animations.

Basics can not be broken down any further, they are abstract and aren't often terribly useful on their own, but they provide a useful reference and allow you to see all your global styles.
